OUTLINE : This randomize , pilot study . The first 3 patient enrol study receive high-dose interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) IV 15 minute , 3 time daily , day 1-5 15-19 denileukin diftitox IV 15-60 minute daily day 8-10 . If dose-limiting toxicity occur receive denileukin diftitox , subsequent patient randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive denileukin diftitox ( high dose first 3 patient enrol study ) IV 15-60 minute daily day -4 -2 high-dose IL-2 IV 15 minute , 3 time daily , day 1-5 15-19 . - Arm II : Patients receive high-dose IL-2 arm I denileukin diftitox ( high dose first 3 patient enrol study ) IV 15-60 minute higher dose daily day 8-10 .
